casebody.data:
Rodman C. THOMPSON, Jr., Petitioner
v.
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, Respondent No. 418 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 20, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
